sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations with complex coefficients
message_1:
Solve the following system of linear equations with complex coefficients:

2x + 3y + 4z = 6 + 4i

x + 5y - 2z = -8 - i

3x - y + 2z = 5 + 2i

Where x, y and z are complex numbers.
message_2:
To solve this system of linear equations, we can use the method of substitution or elimination. In this case, we will use the elimination method.

First, we will eliminate x from the second and third equations. To do this, multiply the second equation by 3 and the third equation by -1:

(1) 2x + 3y + 4z = 6 + 4i
(2) 3x + 15y - 6z = -24 - 3i
(3) -3x + y - 2z = -5 - 2i

Now, add equations (2) and (3):

(4) 16y - 8z = -29 - 5i

Next, we will eliminate x from the first and third equations. To do this, multiply the first equation by 3 and the third equation by 2:

(1) 6x + 9y + 12z = 18 + 12i
(3) -6x + 2y - 4z = -10 - 4i

Now, add equations (1) and (3):

(5) 11y + 8z = 8 + 8i

Now we have two equations with two variables, y and z:

(4) 16y - 8z = -29 - 5i
(5) 11y + 8z = 8 + 8i

Add equations (4) and (5):

(6) 27y = -21 + 3i

Now, divide both sides of equation (6) by 27:

y = (-21 + 3i) / 27

y = -7/9 + i/9

Now that we have the value of y, we can substitute it back into equation (4) or (5) to find the value of z. We will use equation (5):

11y + 8z = 8 + 8i

11(-7/9 + i/9) + 8z = 8 + 8i

-77/9 + 11i/9 + 8z = 8 + 8i

Now, isolate z:

8z = 8 + 8i + 77/9 - 11i/9

8z = (8 + 77/9) + (8 - 11/9)i

8z = (149/9) + (61/9)i

Now, divide both sides by 8:

z = (149/72) + (61/72)i

Now that we have the values of y and z, we can substitute them back into one of the original equations to find the value of x. We will use the first equation:

2x + 3y + 4z = 6 + 4i

2x + 3(-7/9 + i/9) + 4((149/72) + (61/72)i) = 6 + 4i

2x - 7 + i + 2(149/36) + (61/18)i = 6 + 4i

Now, isolate x:

2x = 7 - i - 2(149/36) - (61/18)i + 6 + 4i

2x = (13 - 298/36) + (3/18)i

2x = (-23/36) + (1/6)i

Now, divide both sides by 2:

x = (-23/72) + (1/12)i

So the solution to the system of linear equations is:

x = (-23/72) + (1/12)i
y = -7/9 + i/9
z = (149/72) + (61/72)i
